item.name: JACKET CANVAS SPECIAL EDITION BIG SHARK
item.description: The JACKET CANVAS SPECIAL EDITION BIG SHARK combines eco-friendly style with a bold design. Made from 100% organic cotton in Portugal, it features a durable 390 g/sqm fabric, pigment-dyed finish, and practical front pockets. The standout: a large shark patch on the back for an adventurous

item.name: Jacket la dolce vita
item.description: Stay relaxed and stylish all summer long with the Jacket La Dolce Vita. \nThis relaxed jacket embodies the carefree spirit of the Italian "dolce vita" lifestyle. Cozy texture made small cors. Perfect for any summer adventure. \nDesigned in collaboration with Joana Astolfi.

item.name: Good Times Crewneck Sweater
item.description: Description of Good Times Crewneck Sweater

item.name: Pants la dolce vita
item.description: Unwind and embrace the Italian lifestyle with our PANTS LA DOLCE VITA. Perfect for a relaxed summer, these pants will transport you to a state of leisure and enjoyment. \nWith an elastic waist, the pants have a tapered fit, complete with two side and two back pockets. Experience the sweet life for yourself with these stylish and comfortable pants. \nDesigned in collaboration with Joana Astolfi.

item.name: PANTS CORDS MECCA
item.description: We love corduroy's durability and warmth, so we've tailored our pants to be comfortable and versatile. Ideal for colder days, these pants add interest and texture to any occasion. With an elastic waist, the pants have a tapered fit, complete with two side and two back pockets.

item.name: Flared Striped Pants
item.description: 100% cotton \nTrue to size. Flared fit \nMade in Portugal

item.name: SWEATPANTS CHARCOAL
item.description: Cut from 100% organic Plush cotton, our medium-weight sweatpants are designed to be comfortable and stylish with a relaxed fit. Team yours with the matching hoodie and a timeless Essential t-shirt.

item.name: Cycle shorts in Ecru
item.description: Women's Activewear and sustainable fashion go hand-in-hand with our Ecru Cycling Shorts. Bike shorts are a classic basic in work out clothing because they support your movement and activity. These ecru cycling shorts are sustainable clothing that cannot be missed in your capsule wardrobe. Cotton hugs the body for a comfortable fit. - Made with Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) 93% Cotton; 7% Elastane - Sensitive Skin Friendly Clothing.

item.name: Cycle shorts
item.description: Women's Activewear and sustainable clothing go hand-in-hand with our Black and Brown Colour-Block Cycling Shorts. Bike shorts provide a classic Athleisure silhouette to support movement and activity. At Organique work out clothing meets sustainable fashion that is a must have in every capsule wardrobe. With colour-block detailing, the GOTS certified Organic Cotton stretch jersey seamlessly hugs your body for a comfortable fit.- Made with GOTS certified Organic Cotton Stretch Jersey; 91% Organic Cotton, 9% Elastane Sensitive Skin Friendly Clothing

item.name: Mara Tancel Trousers
item.description:
Made for lasting quality these White Tencel 
Trousers are perfect for any occasion. 
These tailored pants feature wide legs, elastic waistband on the back, and soft front pleats for an elegant but comfortable look. 
We know you won't be sorry when you feel how soft this fabric is!Materials: 
100% Tencel 
Care Instructions: 
Machine Wash Cold Inside Out. 
Don't Tumble Dry. 
Iron at low temperature inside out.

item.name: Merino Wool Beanie
item.description: Knitted from 100% Extra-Fine Merino Wool, this double folded, extra-soft yet structured Beanie is crafted from luxury Italian yarns and carefully knitted by our portuguese specialist Orfama. Everything to keep you warm on that winter night or stylish at the party. Mulesing-free.

item.name: White Chair Blue Hat
item.description: Made with a classic and relaxed silhouette, our Denim Cap is cut from the same Denim Work Jacket and Jeans Undyed fabric for optimal consumption. It does not follow a dyeing process, meaning any harmful chemicals, no colors, not even natural dyes. It has a gently curved peak and comes with a fun twist embroidered.

item.name: Sophia Blue Cardigan
item.description:
An Ethical Essential: The Neutral Knit Cardigan. 
Featuring an oversized fit making it soft and comfortable, it's made with Recycled Fibers creating a unique textured knit. Materials: 
45% Wool 
35% Recycled Wool 
20% Recycled Polyamide 
GRS Certified

item.name: Cycle shorts
item.description: Women's Activewear and sustainable clothing go hand-in-hand with our Black and Brown Colour-Block Cycling Shorts. Bike shorts provide a classic Athleisure silhouette to support movement and activity. At Organique work out clothing meets sustainable fashion that is a must have in every capsule wardrobe. With colour-block detailing, the GOTS certified Organic Cotton stretch jersey seamlessly hugs your body for a comfortable fit.- Made with GOTS certified Organic Cotton Stretch Jersey; 91% Organic Cotton, 9% Elastane Sensitive Skin Friendly Clothing

item.name: ISTO Hat
item.description: Made with a classic and relaxed silhouette, our Cap is cut from the same Work Jacket fabric for optimal consumption. Same production batch color. Same peachy touch. It has a gently curved peak and, well, our first visible logo. Let's use it properly and take good care.
